column1: Little Goat Diner////Their burger is excellent
column2: and reminds me of a larger version of an In and Out burger
column3: and I lived in SoCal for five years
column4: so I'm an authority. I don't think I've eaten something bad. Love the Sloppy Goat. Order a side of the cheesy hash browns
column5: and thank me later. Next door
column6: they have a great little coffee shop attached
column7: and a bakery with fresh baked bread. Try the sour dough.
